author: lgo
msg: Follow up to r22349: Remove the pool parameter of svn_path_is_absolute,
since the new implementation doesn't use it anymore. Update all references.
(svn_path_is_absolute): remove the pool parameter from the function

author: lgo
msg: Avoid creating a working copy until it's sure the test will not be skipped.
broken_authz_file): first test to skip the test, than create the sandbox.

author: lgo
msg: The test refresh_read_only_attribute will fail when run as root on
*nix platforms. This is expected and correct behavior, so just
skip this test when the tests are run as root.
(refresh_read_only_attribute): skip the test if platform is unix

variable declaration to the start of the code block.
